text: Sano ni ŵatoposyanile ŵanaŵaŵili wa kunnango, basi (ŵammasyeto) ŵampapwile (Yusufu) kansu jakwe chakunyuma, niŵansimene ŵanaŵaŵilio pannango bwana jwao (ŵammasyetowo - ŵali ŵankwao). (Ŵammasyeto) ŵatite: “Malipilochi kwa mundu jwaasachileje kutenda yakusakala ku ŵankwenu, pangaŵaga kutaŵidwa kapena kupedwa ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope?”
